text: Proteasomal / ubiquitylation inhibitors MG132 and PYR - 41 ( Sigma - Aldrich ) were used at the described concentrations dissolved in DMSO . For controls , cells were treated with DMSO . For pre - treatment , cells were initially treated with MG132 , followed by WNV infection for one hour . This was followed by replacing the medium with medium containing MG132 at appropriate concentrations .
